job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongThe strongPurposestrong of Your RolebrbrFidelity Workplace Investing is seeking a Data Scientist to support our Customer Inclusion initiatives This position will work with technical professionals in data science and with managers of market research and product development teams The assignments may include exploratory analysis feature engineering cluster analysis predictive analytics causal inference and presentation of findingsbrbrAs Data Scientists we support projects across many areas and ensure the highest degree of quality You must be a great teammate who thrives in a small highly effective work environment and communicates with confidence to all levels of Workplace Investing The ideal Data Scientist handles projects from start to finish ie they can work with market research on survey design gather required data in any shape and size process the data analyze them graphically and statistically draw useful and unique insights package the information into effective presentations and present results to colleagues and business partnersbrbrThe strongSkillsstrong You BringbrulliData extraction and feature engineering for processing and transforming data into relevant featuresliliStatistical and data science programming with proficiency in Python or RliliQuantitative research including survey design and analysis factor and principle components analysis experimental design causal inference or other related fieldsliliExploratory data analysis statistical graphics and effective data visualizationliliCommitted to continuous learning and able to pick up new knowledge quicklyliliExcellent verbal and written communication skills especially regarding technical communication Able to communicate technical information to individuals at all levels of technical expertisebrbrliulEstrongducation brstrongulliMasters Degree in a quantitative or computational field eg Statistics Computer Science Data Science Machine Learning Economics Operations Research or Applied Mathematics with applied research experienceliliMasters Degree in a social or biological science field eg Biology Bioinformatics Sociology or Psychology with quantitative research experiencebrbrliulHow Your Work strongImpactsstrong the OrganizationbrbrAs a Data Scientist in Fidelity Workplace Investments you will use analytics to help Fidelity product owners and technologists identify underserved segments in Fidelitys customer base You will assist in designing solutions for those individuals and measuring success for products that are launched This is a growing and critical element of Fidelitys business strategybrbrstrongCompany OverviewbrbrstrongAt Fidelity we are passionate about making our financial expertise broadly accessible and effective in helping people live the lives they want We are a privately held company that places a high degree of value in creating and nurturing a work environment that attracts the best talent and reflects our commitment to our associates We are proud of our diverse and inclusive workplace where we respect and value our associate for their unique perspectives and experiences For information about working at Fidelity visit FidelityCareerscom Fidelity Investments is an equal opportunity employerbrbrstrongAccommodation LanguagebrbrstrongstrongTo Initiate a Request For An
